div.p: we are an information technology company based in Sohar, Sultanate of Oman. our main focus is to deliver accurate business solutions using Odoo to provide customized EPR. our main concern is doing business the right way.

li.p: Thanks to our extensive experience in computer systems, we provide innovative solutions to our customers to manage their businesses easily by using the famous Odoo system. Our team can provide all software units that can manage a business, including accounting, finance, human resource management, warehouse management, insurances, and sales management, and we also help our customers find special and appropriate solutions for their needs in managing their business.

We believe that mobile applications are an integral part of running a successful business. Therefore, Badael Tech provide a service for designing and developing applications using all operating systems.

We help our customers to make their business available on the Internet by designing websites for their companies. We guarantee the complete creation of websites in addition to managing and adjusting all their settings.
Do not bear the worry of searching for the right hosting for your site because we provide you with the best hosting at the best possible price.

li.h4: Provision of point of sale system (POS)
li.p: We provide you with the equipment for the point of sale for companies and stores, accompanied by its operating program.
We create professional e-stores and offer advanced strategies in digital marketing and advertising campaigns management.
We help you in training your team through training courses in various fields where we are happy to share our experiences and skills with you

We have a team specialized in analyzing data and monitoring everything about your company. A comprehensive analysis of the company enables you to plan well for the future and avoid all potential obstacles.
We can provide different technical support teams, who are well trained to listen perfectly to customers' requests and needs and solve them in record time
We provide technical advice and guidance for your business, study your situation and needs well, and then guide you to meet your needs

div.p: The only platform you will ever need to help run your business integrated apps, kept simple, and loved by millions of happy users

Odoo Is An Open Source Business Management System, This System Contains Several Software Applications That Will Help Entrepreneurs And Company Owners To Find Enterprise Resource Planning, As It Meets Their Needs In Many Matters Such As Sales Management, Accounting, Finance, Human Resource Management, And Inventory Management .

Odoo Is A Global System That Can Help All Companies Of Any Size, As It Is Used By More Than 5 Million People Around The World And Shares With About 1250 Partners Around The World, And It Also Provides About 27500 Applications For Enterprise Resource Planning.

div.h5: With Odoo, you don't need anything else
div.p: Thanks to its diversity of applications, Odoo brings you all the solutions for all enterprise resource requirements, its diversity of platforms and its constant updating make it a modern system that keeps pace with all aspects of enterprise resource planning.

Thanks to its simple and harmonious design, Odoo provides a very easy user experience for businessmen, where anyone can download and install it, and because Odoo is an open source program, it allows company owners to benefit from its services comfortably, these services include finding solutions in accounting, finance, sales management, e-commerce, technical support services for customers, human resources management and many business management services .

div.h3: Now you can manage everything using one platform

div.p: One of the most negative things that entrepreneurs face is the overlapping of management programs and applications with each other, although they are separate, as it is very difficult to manage them at the same time and coordinate between them, now with Odoo you can manage all the applications related to your business using one platform, which makes it easier You have to monitor all aspects of your company simultaneously and thus find quick and effective enterprise resource planning.

div.h3: Odoo helps you no matter the size of your company

div.p: Odoo provides the ability to download its applications for all companies, including startups, as these applications enable entrepreneurs to use them in various fields related to managing their business, thanks to this flexibility, Odoo has become the most downloaded business program in the world, with more than 5 million users.

Thanks to its diversity of applications, Odoo brings you all the solutions for all enterprise resource requirements, its diversity of platforms and its constant updating make it a modern system that keeps pace with all aspects of enterprise resource planning.
Sales apps in Odoo allow the management of sales in a very smooth and professional manner, now with Odoo it is possible to manage all sales easily
And Because It Has Become Necessary For The Company To Exist On The Internet, Odoo Provides You With A Distinctive Place On The Internet By Creating And Managing Your Website
Finance Apps In Odoo Allow You To Manage The Financial Side Of The Company, As It Can Create Accounting Solutions And Process All Sales Data.
Through Odoo, It Becomes Possible To Manage Personnel Affairs With Flexibility. These Apps Allow Managing Workers' Salaries And Vacations, As Well As Conducting Job Interviews And Employment.
These Apps Allow To Facilitate All The Company’s Operations. These Operations Are Mainly Represented In Inventory Management, Customer Orders Management And Some Mini Projects Within The Company.
Marketing Is One Of The Pillars Of A Successful Business, So Odoo's Marketing Apps Allow An Excellent Experience To Manage The Company's Marketing Department.
These Apps Enable Perfect Communication Between Employees Or With Customers

div.h5: Apps That Enable You To Manage Relationships With Your Customers
div.p: Thanks To The Flexible Communication Apps Provided By Odoo, You Can Now Communicate With Your Customers With Ease. These Apps Provide An Ideal Communication Bridge Between You And The Customer, Making It Easier For You To Establish A Professional Relationship With Customers

div.h5: We Have A Professional And Multi-Disciplinary Team At Badail Tech.
div.p: This team provides all the services related to the enterprise resource planning by using the Odoo system that our workers are proficient in, Odoo system is the main platform that our team deals with professionally and meets all our customers' requests for managing their business.

At Badael Tech, we strive to be an integral part of Oman’s endeavors to digitize all sectors in 2040, as we want to be an effective partner for all the efforts made by the Sultanate in managing by using modern technologies
